testimonials.testimonial_clip: One of Justin’s standout strengths is his versatility. He is equally effective in tackling technical challenges and addressing community-related concerns. … [H]e approaches every situation with a high level of professionalism and consistency.

Justin consistently went above and beyond, completing both technically advanced and simple tasks. From troubleshooting Linux issues online, to interfacing with customers in person — Justin shines in both high level and get-your-hands-dirty work.
